page.title: 18Trade
page.content: Until the beginning of this century, most trade in{Montrose}was connected with the sea.Now other types of trades have been introduced. Joseph Johnston & Sons are a salmon fishing business who have been operating from{Montrose}for over 100 years.They still fish from open boats- an old method of fishing. The Rope & Sail Company, who have premises in Bents Rd, make a wide variety of goods in canvas. The harbour is very busy,receiving ships from all over the world.A wide variety of goods are imported and exported at{Montrose Harbour.} On Wednesdays the livestock auction takes place and on Fridays stalls are set up at the Ball House. There are a wide variety of shops in the High St including 3 large stores. Recently a super-store was built.
